message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I really appreciate you considering me.  $150 is a bit more than I'm looking to spend right now.  Would you be willing to go down to $110?
Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $150 and $110. How about I sell it to you for $130?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down.  $130 is still a bit more than I'm willing to pay.  How about $125?  I'm really close to my budget on this.
Hi Bob, I understand you're close to your budget, and I appreciate your honesty. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about I sell it to you for $127?
Alice, thanks for your willingness to compromise. I'm still a little over budget.  Would you be willing to go down to $122?  That's the absolute most I can do.
